title: YSK plastic straws are not recyclable, and make up a huge ... - Reddit
body: Plastic straws cannot be recycled due to being made of polypropylene, a byproduct of petroleum. Because of the large amount of energy it requires to extract and refine this material, straws cannot be broken down and recycled. When the plastics roll down the conveyer belts at recycling facilities, straws and plastic bottle caps wind up falling ...
